mapper.sql: id, date, start_time, end_time, station_id, data_source, code, error_type, num
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO data_quality_error
date,
start_time,
end_time,
station_id,
data_source,
code,
error_type,
num
#{date},
#{startTime},
#{endTime},
#{stationId},
#{dataSource},
#{code},
#{errorType},
#{num}
mapper.select:
SELECT station_id,station_name from cloudiip_access_equipment.v_stations_codes where 1=1
and ISNULL(hlpt_calcu) and ISNULL(hlpt_newengergycloud)
and ISNULL(danji_code)
and ISNULL(device_num)
and ISNULL(glyc_code)

SELECT SUM(aa.sssj) sssj, SUM(aa.hlpt) hlpt, SUM(aa.djxc) djxc, SUM(aa.glyc) glyc from ( SELECT station_id,station_name, IF(ISNULL(device_num)=1,0,1) sssj, IF(ISNULL(hlpt_calcu)=1&&ISNULL(hlpt_newengergycloud)=1,0,1) hlpt, IF(ISNULL(danji_code)=1,0,1) djxc, IF(ISNULL(glyc_code)=1,0,1) glyc from cloudiip_access_equipment.v_stations_codes ) aa
